articles.description: ‘We’re having a lot of great conversations with legacy UPS customers,’ FedEx exec says
articles.content: As United Parcel Service Inc. and its unionized employees try to hammer out a new labor contract, rival package-delivery company FedEx Corp. is finding opportunity in the friction, a FedEx executive … [+2126 chars]

articles.title: Ex-Goldman banker was 'framed,' attorney says at insider trial's close - Reuters
articles.description: Former Goldman Sachs banker Brijesh Goel's trial on insider trading charges drew to a close on Tuesday, with his attorney saying he was framed by his friend and a prosecutor saying Goel had lied to a New York jury.
articles.content: June 20 (Reuters) - Former Goldman Sachs banker Brijesh Goel's trial on insider trading charges drew to a close on Tuesday, with his attorney saying he was framed by his friend and a prosecutor sayin… [+2036 chars]

articles.title: Boeing, Airbus ink massive aircraft deals with Indian airlines - The Washington Post
articles.description: The massive orders by carriers India Air and IndiGo for hundreds of Boeing and Airbus jets underscore substantial economic growth in India.
